Package com.ap.kas.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ap.kas.controllers.UserController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController class contains methods for the finalization of a user.

        @PostMapping("/requestCustomer/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> requestCustomerFinalization​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                                            java.lang.String id)
        Sends a finalization mail to a given customer
        Parameters:
        id - - Id of the given customer
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity Contains either a 200(OK) or a 400(BAD REQUEST) when the customer does not exist

      • finalizeCustomer

        @PutMapping("/finalizeCustomer")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> finalizeCustomer​(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                                 @Valid CustomerInfoDto customerInfoDto)
        Finalizes a customer
        Parameters:
        customerInfoDto - - Dto containing information of the customer to be finalized
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) OR a 400(OK) when the token is invalid or the finalization fails in any other way

        @PostMapping("/requestEmployee/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> requestEmployeeFInalization​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                                            java.lang.String id)
        Sends a finalization mail to a given employee
        Parameters:
        id - - Id of the given employee
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity Contains either a 200(OK) or a 400(BAD REQUEST) when the employee does not exist

        Parameters:
